author: bimargulies
msg: Disconnect collections from the rest of the build. Release process to follow.

author: gstein
msg: Start using svn_wc__db_base_add_directory to update a directory's state
Also fix some bugs in NEW_RELPATH computation, and clean out the now-unused
(make_dir_baton): add an ADDING parameter, necessary for computing the
NEW_RELPATH during an update process. revamp all the computations with
(open_root, add_directory, open_directory): pass the appropriate value
(close_directory): be wary about updating the directory if it is not
"part" of the update. otherwise, go ahead and update its revision,
changed_* values, props, etc. using the db_base_add_directory function.
(svn_wc__db_base_add_directory): do not assert non-NULL on CHILDREN
